## Slide Backgrounds { .scrollable}

```{.python code-line-numbers="6-8|9"}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

r = np.arange(0, 2, 0.01)
theta = 2 * np.pi * r    # <1>
fig, ax = plt.subplots(subplot_kw={'projection': 'polar'}) #<2>
ax.plot(theta, r)
ax.set_rticks([0.5, 1, 1.5, 2])
ax.grid(True)
plt.show()
```
